arts.ttl: Anderlecht’s Yari Verschaeren not keen on move to Trabzonspor
arts.sum: According to Het Nieuwsblad, Trabzonspor have reached out to Anderlecht about a possible transfer for attacking midfielder Yari Verschaeren. The young Belgian was highly rated coming out of the sides…

arts.ttl: Beerschot announce loan for Rwandan prospect Hakim Sahabo from Standard Liege
arts.sum: Standard Liege's Hakim Sahabo (19) has signed a half-season loan contract at Beerschot.

arts.ttl: “I am sure this is the right decision”: Anderlecht’s Mexican target in Belgium to complete transfer to purple and whites
arts.sum: Anderlecht fans look forward to the signing of Mexican winger César Huerta (24), as the UNAM player arrives in Belgium for medical (HLN).
